title: ISic000272. I.Sicily inscription 000272
body:
Facsimile Images

Dis Manib(us) ((ivy-leaf))
((ivy-leaf)) Epilanta-
((ivy-leaf))no ((ivy-leaf)) Patra ((ivy-leaf))
Annius ((ivy-leaf)) Chry-
5santa · alumn[o]
((ivy-leaf)) b(ene) · m(erenti) ·

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon Bitto 2001

English translation

To the shades of the underworld, for Epilantanus Patra. Annius Chrysanta (set this up) for his well-deserved pupil.

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.6983 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • xxi https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
